人格者: (じんかくしゃ) - person of character; man of character

人権問題: (じんけんもんだい) - human rights issue

人権状況: (じんけんじょうきょう) - human rights situation; human rights condition

人権蹂躪: (じんけんじゅうりん) - (yoji) human rights violation; trampling on human rights
人欲: (じんよく) - human desires; human passions
人毎: (ひとごと) - with each person; with everyone
人民: (おおみたから) - imperial subjects; the people

人民元建て: (じんみんげんだて) - denominated in Chinese Yuan; denominated in renminbi

人民裁判: (じんみんさいばん) - people's trial (court)
人民解放軍: (じんみんかいほうぐん) - People's Liberation Army
人気をさらう: (にんきをさらう) - to capture all the popularity; to steal the show; to upstage
人気を掠う: (にんきをさらう) - to capture all the popularity; to steal the show; to upstage
人気を攫う: (にんきをさらう) - to capture all the popularity; to steal the show; to upstage
人気取り: (にんきとり) - bid for popularity; publicity stunt
人気商売: (にんきしょうばい) - (yoji) occupations dependent on public favor (favour)
人気失墜: (にんきしっつい) - (yoji) decline in public favor; fall in popularity
人気役者: (にんきやくしゃ) - stage favorite; stage favourite; star
人気投票: (にんきとうひょう) - popularity contest
人気株: (にんきかぶ) - popular stock; popular share; active stock; favourite stock
人気沸騰: (にんきふっとう) - (yoji) (enjoy) tumultuous (tremendous, overwhelming) popularity
人気稼業: (にんきかぎょう) - (yoji) popular occupation; occupation largely dependent on public favor
人気絶頂: (にんきぜっちょう) - (yoji) at the height (peak) of one's popularity
人気者: (にんきもの) - popular person; favorite; favourite
人波: (ひとなみ) - surging crowd; wave of humanity; stampede
人波を泳ぐ: (ひとなみをおよぐ) - to wade through a crowd
人海戦術: (じんかいせんじゅつ) - (yoji) infiltration tactics; human-wave tactics

人為: (じんい) - human work; human agency; art; artificiality

人生: (じんせい) - (human) life (i.e. conception to death)
